briefdescription.para: Class to take in a config file of ConfigTranslator form and parse the commands to create a full cryomesh object.

listitem.para: needs to hold a fakeid to realid mapping to facillitate using fake ids in config files before the objects ids are actually known
holds a unique instance of any create cryomeshes
holds other data from the config file or defaults such as database name, filename, data filename, etc
